"@Princess♠Molestia":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5532cdd26368723b64830200#post_5532cdd26368723b64830200
I used to read fallout equestria and a lot of the fanfics until they started getting ultra edgy.

How the fallout equestria circle started out: "a spoonfull of whiskey makes the medicine go down". . . also all the gay romance.
What it became: "crawling in my skin!"

If you want to read it start with the early stuff, cause the early stuff is pretty good.  The later stuff is 3edgy5me.

Why I still like the early on stuff:
!https://derpicdn.net/img/2013/3/1/258720/large.png!
. . and yes there is a lot of gay stuff.
